conversations.content: Please note that this story contains spoilers for Laxi's adventurer story, as well as the main campaign through Chapter 14.
Releasing limiters. Initiating mode shift.
Annihilation mode activated.
▷Seizing control... Ready!◁
▷Our target is that pack of fiends.◁ Commencing elimination. ▷Let's clear 'em out!◁
No further targets detected. ▷Whew! Nice work, Laxi.◁
Laxi, reporting in. ▷We dealt with the fiends.◁
Nice! Everything go okay?
▷Yep! If anything, we finished sooner than we expected.◁
Hey, no complaints there! Or from you, Mascula, now that I think of it. You good?
▷＂Good＂? I don't follow.◁
No, just... I mean, it hasn't been long since you made up your mind to fight.
And with you being such a softy and all, I wasn't sure how you'd take to it.
Agreed. Do you truly intend to continue engaging in combat?
You claimed you would never fight, yet you do. Your words and actions are in paradox.
▷Well, yeah, I suppose they are. And I still don't WANT to hurt anyone.◁
▷But I've resolved to continue fighting until the day it's no longer required.◁
Respect for that—though whatever you decide, know that I've got your back.
▷I appreciate it, Luca—and I know I'll be even more help in the future.◁
▷Laxi and I still haven't reached our full potential yet.◁
You're talkin' about that crazy Eden mode thingie you pulled off before, yeah? No luck making it work again?
Its use is available. However, the system strain is significant, so application is limited to short, controlled bursts.
▷If we could get it to be a bit more stable, the strain might be more manageable— but as of right now, we still don't even understand how it WORKS.◁
Too bad your maestro didn't leave an instruction manual.
▷Yeah, I wish we had a clue.◁ ...We may.
You got an idea there, Laxi?
Affirmative. If we seek answers about our maestro, our destination is clear. ▷Destination? Wait, you don't mean—◁
The ruins of his research facility.
That's in Dyrenell territory, yeah?
With Zethia gone, it's gonna be chaos over there. You sure it's a good idea to go pokin' around?
We have no other means of learning about Eden mode—and that power will certainly be required in future battles.
Look, all I'm saying is that we ain't got a clue what's goin' on over there in the BEST of circumstances, much less now.
▷Well then, we'll just have to get a former imperial soldier to lead the way.◁
Why should I play tour guide for some psychopathic widget like you?
Uh, Mascula? Who's the old dude?
▷I forgot you haven't met. Remember our fight with the Empire at Myriage Lake?◁
▷Well, this is one of the villagers who tried to get revenge on Laxi.◁
The ones who beat the ever-loving tar out of you guys to try and get revenge?
Don't forget the part where we eased off! That Mascula or whoever it was made some decent points.
▷Heh. I was really relieved to see you lower your weapons.◁
Well, I didn't do it because I wanted to make friends with the likes of you, so let's get this over with.
There, up ahead. That's the place, yeah?
Motion detected at laboratory entrance. Race: Human. Affiliation: Dyrenell Empire.
What do they want with a trashed lab? Looking for magic weapons, maybe?
Unknown. However, their numbers are insufficient to deter our infiltration. We will follow them inside.
Laxi, do you EVER have a lower gear?! ...Sorry, pal. You better hang back here until we get this all sorted.
No complaints from me! Hey, but... be careful, all right?
This was our maestro's laboratory.
▷Those soldiers really picked it over. There may not be anything left to find.◁
Hee hee.  ▷Okay, what's the joke?◁
I am the commanding unit, so I know. You are not, so you do not. Hee hee. ▷Right, which is why I'm ASKING.◁
I know where to find the entrance to his hidden chamber.
▷I had no clue this place existed.◁ Even I have never been inside.
▷Hey, Laxi! Take a look at this!◁
Well? Any luck, guys?
▷We found a new outfit for Laxi.◁
▷Its design should accommodate the extra armaments that materialize when Eden mode is activated.◁
No doubt it was created for that express purpose as a final present from our maestro. I will equip it now.
Whoa, hang on! You can't just strip down in the middle of—GAH!
Overruled. I will equip it now.
And I'll...uh...go stand guard outside! Very, VERY far outside.
▷Sorry to keep you waiting, Luca.◁  How do I look? Great, yes? Excellent?
You look good, Laxi. Now if the fashion show is over, let's look for more clues.
Praise enthusiasm level unacceptable. ▷Whoa, easy, Laxi! Let's just see what we can find in here, okay?◁
So I know I said I'd help look for clues, but I don't even know what LANGUAGE half this stuff is written in.
▷Leave it, Laxi. It's too dangerous.◁ Probability of success: Guaranteed. Your objection is overruled.
Huh? What are you two up to over th—
Whoa! What is THAT thing?!
▷A magical weapon our maestro made.◁ It operates on the same commands as the combat androids. Extremely convenient. We will keep it for ourselves.
Uhhh, yeah that's...great and all, buuut... LAXI, CAN YOU PLEASE HURRY UP AND STOP IT ALREADY?!
Affirmative.
▷Well! I guess that just happened.◁ A minor control failure. It will not reoccur.
Your ＂minor＂ control failure sent all these books flying off to... Hello! What's this?
Hey guys, check this out. It says, ＂Combat Android Development Diary.＂
Show me at once. ▷Let's read it!◁
Well? Any big news in there?
Conditional affirmative. This is a record of the history of combat androids.
It claims we are magical weapons made by recreating the technology of a civilization lost 700 years ago.
Wait, but you guys are 300 years old, right? So this tech is from another seven centuries BEFORE that?
▷From a millennium ago, yes. During the First War of Binding.◁
Whoa. That's amazing!
▷Indeed. But that isn't the only unusual thing at work here.◁
There is another piece of ancient technology inside my body.
And what's THAT one do?
▷You've actually seen one in operation. It harvests mana from nature and causes it to materialize: A mana kiln.◁
The thing we saw at Lake Reeve?!
You stand before a mana kiln, a device wrought from ancient wisdom that permits the harvesting and subsequent physical utilization of mana.
That thing had bad news written all over it. You sure it's okay to have one of those dealies kickin' around inside you?
▷Very. It's much smaller than the one at Lake Reeve, so there's no danger of causing any extensive damage.◁
Okay then, bigger issue: WHY is there a mana kiln inside your body?
A surprisingly apt question. The answer lies in Eden mode.
Hey! What do you mean, ＂surprisingly＂?!
Adverb: Eliciting surprise. Unexpectedly.
I didn't sign up for this much snark... Look, so how does that thing tie in to Eden mode?
The mana kiln is linked directly to the Eden mode system.
By igniting the mana kiln, the connected circuits are able to effectively absorb mana from the surrounding environment.
This dramatically increases my processing speeds and response times, engaging a status known as Eden mode.
I don't know a circuit from a circus here, but you're saying Eden mode's crazy power is actually the mana kiln's crazy power?
Affirmative. Your mind is surprisingly nimble today.
Yeah yeah, I'm off to college after this. So if that kiln's such a handy doo-dad, why'd it stay quiet up till now?
▷There was a fatal flaw in the Eden mode startup protocols.◁
What flaw?
▷To engage Eden mode, we have to release all limiters and reroute all circuits to support the mana kiln's ignition.◁
▷But that's the problem: Another mode is automatically activated as soon as the last limiter is released.◁
Is that the ＂release all limiters＂ thing she keeps saying? The one that...oh!
▷You see it now? Releasing all limiters activates annihilation mode, an offensive state that makes no distinction between friend and foe.◁
▷Sure, it enhances Laxi's combat ability, but it also makes her unable to do ANYTHING else but fight.◁
▷Which means it's impossible for her to shift to Eden mode by herself.◁
Then how'd she pull it off before?
Mascula wields annihilation mode access and control privileges.
When I enter annihilation mode, Mascula is able to control my body.
▷But even that comes with a condition.◁
Holy crap, there are SO many rules...
Mascula must synchronize with my autonomous drive.
▷Put in human terms, our hearts have to become as one.◁
▷We first entered Eden mode right after I decided to fight together with Laxi.◁
So you synced up with her will to fight, and that met the condition for Eden mode?
▷Right. And we still have a whole bunch of questions about this, but that's what we've got as of right now...◁
So you don't know how to stabilize Eden mode yet? Man, that was the whole point of even coming to this joint!
Affirmative. We still lack that knowledge.
So he wrote everything but the good part? C'mon, there's gotta be something else! A clue or a riddle or a—
Who goes there?!
Ah!
A combat android...? You're Alberian!
Welp, so much for stealth. Let's get the hell outta here!
Affirmative. ▷Right behind you!◁
One of those intruders was a combat android that will surely prove a powerful asset to our glorious Dyrenell Empire. Capture it alive, no matter the cost!
Sir, yes, sir!
*huff* *pant* Sorry for the wait! You miss us?
Not especially—and I certainly didn't miss the imperials who are clearly chasing you.
Yeah, sorry 'bout that. They're probably going to be on us at any moment.
Affirmative. Preparing for combat.
Over there!
Laxi's got the idea: It's fight or die! You hold this side of things while I try to wrap around the flank, yeah?
Understood. Prioritizing swift elimination before reinforcements can be summoned. Mascula, requesting Eden mode activation. ▷Right. I'm on it.◁
Initiating... Limiters released. Mode shift...Eden.
By the heavens... What IS that thing?! I've never heard of a combat android with such powers!
Graaaugh!
▷Crossing system zenith in 60... LAXI! Whatever you're gonna do, do it fast!◁ I am aware of the time constraints.
Th-that thing's a monster...
We'll hold the line, Lieutenant! Go summon reinforcements!
Are you insane?! You'll all be dead by the time they arrive!
My life belongs to the Dyrenell Empire, and she cannot afford to lose you here. Go, for the sake of the Empire's future!
We shall sing songs of your sacrifice, soldier... I'll return as soon as I can!
If we fall today, our bodies will be the bones for Dyrenell's glorious tomorrow!
Dys fahr Dyrenell!
▷They'll die to protect their leader...◁ Irrelevant. All hostiles will be purged.
▷No! Laxi, wait!◁ Overruled. There is no time.
L-Lieutenant... The rest is... in your hands...
▷Aaah!◁
Eden mode...destabilizing? Mascula, what have you done? ▷Huh? I haven't done anything!◁
Mana kiln strain increasing. ▷Uh oh. At this rate...◁
▷Eden mode is...terminated?!◁
▷(But why? So long as I have the will to fight, Eden mode should work fine!)◁
▷(The will to... Oh.)◁
▷(I swore that I would fight, but just now, I hesitated.)◁
The android's wide open! Capture it!
▷(These people have their ideals, and the resolve to defend their allies with their lives. I can't keep...)◁
▷Laxi, I'm sorry. I just can't...◁ Affirmative. I now understand the destabilizing factor inhibiting Eden mode.
Your synchronization with my will is incomplete. You have the resolve to fight, but not the true desire.
Dammit, they're focusing their attacks on Mascula and Laxi! Hold on, guys! I'm co—
Gragh!
All right! We bagged the sylvan!
Mascula, Laxi... Run!
Advantage lost. Initiating tactical retreat. ▷No, we can't leave! They've got Luca!◁
All units, fall in!
▷Hrgh!◁
You think you're the first android that we've dealt with? ...Keep it up, men! Shut that hunk of junk down!
Circuits damaged. If this continues...
Time to end this!
Aaaugh!
▷...Huh? Wait, I didn't feel anything.◁
Are you...all right...?
Oh no. You've been...
Heh... Guess today's...not my day...
Why did you shield me?
I didn't shield YOU... I just... I wanted the other guy to make it.
Without him, we're stuck with a world full of people acting on hatred alone... People like I used to be...
A world like that...will never know peace...
You would entrust the hope of a peaceful future to a combat android like Mascula?
Heh. L-looks like it... Now go... Get out of here while you can...
If they catch you, they'll do far worse than what's in store for the sylvan and me...
▷We won't allow you to be taken prisoner for our sake!◁
That meddling fool... You won't be so fortunate this time!
Tactical retreat engaged. ▷Laxi, no! We can't!◁ We have no choice.
Damn, we lost the android. ...After it, men! And bring that scum with you!
Sir!
No hostiles in range. All clear.
▷I'm sorry, Laxi. I really screwed up.◁ Conditional affirmative.
▷That man was taken prisoner because of us—because of me. And so was Luca.◁
Regret is a luxury we lack the time for. However, if you intend to stop fighting, I will continue to fight alone.
▷...No. No matter how much it hurts, I won't let you do this on your own.◁
▷I want to help save them.◁ Understood. Then I will trust you.
▷Then let's keep pushing forward until I find the way to synchronize with you!◁
(Our...synchronization.)
▷Looks like this is where the imperials are hiding.◁
Enemy numbers unknown—but mere soldiers are not our greatest problem. ▷Yeah, I'm more worried about that pile of magical weapons behind them.◁
▷Guess Luca was right—this squad is in charge of recovering stuff like that.◁
Mascula, hostages sighted. ▷What? Where?◁
▷They're unconscious, but alive. Let's get them out of there.◁
Negative. We cannot permit the magical weapons to be activated. Careful planning is in order.
▷Could we use Eden mode to take out the entire stockpile at once?◁
Possibly. Can you sustain Eden mode?
▷If Luca's life is on the line? You bet. Besides, if we're just destroying weapons, I have no reason to hesitate.◁
Understood. Commencing operation.
▷Okay, we made it in. Let's get rid of those weapons before they're activated.◁ Affirmative. Mode shift...
Eden.
▷Good! Now let's—◁
You kept us waiting.
What?!
The records claim the leader of the combat androids has a heart—which means it will try to save its friends.
This is an ambush. ▷Oh, do you think?!◁
New directive. Switching Eden mode attack target to imperial forces.
Its eyes went green again! ...No matter. Capture that thing, men—even if you have to dent it up a little!
I will not be dented. I will not be taken.
Dys fahr Dyrenell!
My life...for Dyrenell...
▷Ngh! This is... It's so horrible...◁ You must endure it, Mascula.
Dammit! Activate the magical weapons!
Request denied.
Lieutenant, watch out!
What?!
Please, sir... Keep our Empire...safe.
▷NO!◁
Mascula? ▷I'm sorry, Laxi. I can't...◁
Eden mode disengaged again? Hmph. Initiating tactical retreat.
It's running! After it, all of you!
Perimeter security is...lacking. But it will offer temporary refuge.
▷I'm so sorry, Laxi. It seems like all I ever do is hold you back.◁
▷I know this is how war is—I'm not naive. I know that in my head, but my heart...◁
Mascula.
▷Luca's life is in danger. Those are the stakes, and I swore I would do this!◁
▷But I just can't convince myself that it's all right to take a person's life.◁
▷I have to. I know that. But still, I...◁
Negative. There is no need for your heart to desire bloodshed.
▷What?◁
You will continue to hesitate in battles. People will die, and you will hurt.
That is your nature, Mascula—and it is why I feel I can synchronize with you now.
▷You...synchronize with me?◁
You went against your nature in order to fight with me. Now it is my turn.
▷But is that even possible? You've always said I was incomprehensible to you.◁
Affirmative. In its most literal sense, you are impossible for me to comprehend. That will likely remain the case.
But your kindness changed the hearts of those who hated me.
They wished to destroy me, yet they put their faith in you: a combat android. One even risked his life for us.
I have glimpsed the value of mercy for one's enemies. And that, I understand.
▷Laxi...◁
There it is! Don't let it escape!
Sir!
There is no more time. Mascula. Requesting Eden mode reactivation.
▷I'm on it!◁
Initiating... Releasing limiters.
▷All limiters released. Acquiring control!◁
▷Laxi, give me the strength to fight!◁
Granted. Now give me the kindness required to temper my actions. ▷Heh. Take all you need!◁
Mode shift...
EDEN!
Rrrgh! Th-that light...!
Armored regalia fully locked. Mana kiln stable.
▷System strain falling. Laxi, are we...?◁ Affirmative. Synchronization complete.
▷We did it!◁ A simple task. Now...
Gah! It's coming right for us!
All hostiles, surrender at once. Failure to do so will result in...
Connecting to Fig. Set output to full power.
Zwirrr!
Wh-what in blazes was that?! Is everyone all right?!
Sir, that thing targeted the weapon stockpile! They're all gone!
Gone? From a single attack?
▷I repeat, surrender at once!◁ Or Fig's next target will be you.
Lieutenant, it's too strong for us...
Our ideals will never falter—nor will our rage at the loss of our brothers and sisters.
But as an officer of the Dyrenell Empire, I can't order my people to their slaughter.
We surrender, android. Name your terms.
▷Did you hear that, Laxi?!◁ Affirmative. Concluding operation.
HISSSSSS!
This beast is incomprehensible. ▷Aw, don't take it personally, Laxi.◁
Um, what are you doing?
She wants to feed that stray cat, but the furball won't let her near it. What a hoot!
Be silent, Luca. If my target escapes, the fault is yours.
Ha ha! Still, it's unusual to see Laxi take any interest in animals.
I'm as shocked as you are. Guess even androids can change.
So, what's up? You need something?
I received a report about the imperial squadron you took captive the other day.
Yeah, I know we've been trying to pump 'em for intel on the Empire.
They finally agreed to our terms.
This will be a huge help in understanding the situation on the ground in Dyrenell after the recent political unrest.
I wanted to thank all three of you. That was some excellent work.
Aw, it ain't no thing. Hell, we were just trying to figure out more about Eden mode. Everything else just sorta...happened.
Plus, I spent half the time as a prisoner.
Affirmative. Luca did nothing. His greatest contribution was remaining unconscious.
▷Ha! So true! Even after we rescued him, he refused to wake up. Laxi had to carry him all the way back to the Halidom!◁
Be really nice if I could deny any of that...
Wait, you brought down an imperial force of that size with just the two of you?
And with just one body, too.
Hell, I'd surrender if you sent my entire stockpile of magical weapons up in smoke with a single attack. Body count doesn't matter once you see firepower like that.
Fair enough. Still, it's huge that you've gained access to a stable Eden mode on top of annihilation mode.
Oh, speaking of Eden mode, is that extra armor a permanent addition now?
I thought it was something that only materialized while Eden mode was active.
▷That was the case until recently, but it seems to have fully manifested now.◁
With the stabilization of Eden mode, the mana kiln's condenser resumed normal function, likely allowing the regalia to affix fully in place.
Yeah, you lost me at ＂stabilization.＂
Ha! I didn't follow much more than you, Luca. This technology is really something.
Laxi and Mascula say the maestro who made them was a peace-loving man, but...
No, I getcha. Why would some peacenik give something THIS much power?
HISSSSSS! MROOOOWR! *swipe*
Ah.
Hostility detected in the target. Was it an enemy all along? ▷No using daggers on cats, Laxi!◁ Why not? It struck first.
▷It only scratched you because it's scared. Now if you don't calm down, I'll calm you down myself!◁
Understood. Teach me, Mascula.
How do I rid a target of hostile intent without causing it fear?
▷Heh. All right, listen up. First, you...◁
Ha ha ha!
I suppose it doesn't matter much. Whatever power those two find, I'm certain they'll use it wisely.
Just what I was thinkin'!
Interesting. It took the food. ▷See? If you show someone you don't want to fight, they understand!◁
Typical irrational optimism. However...
Conditional affirmative.
